gw.api.web.accounting

Class ChargePatternHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.web.accounting.ChargePatternHelper

  • public class ChargePatternHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to help with the filtering and finding of charge patterns.

    • Method Detail

      • getChargePatterns

        public static java.util.List<ChargePattern> getChargePatterns(IType ownerType)
        Parameters:
        ownerType - The type of the t-account owner for which we want to find charge patterns
        Returns:
        All of the charge patterns that may belong to a t-account owner of the given type

      • getChargePatterns

        public static java.util.List<ChargePattern> getChargePatterns(IType ownerType,
                                              ChargeCategory categoryRequirement)
        Parameters:
        ownerType - The type of the t-account owner for which we want to find charge patterns
        categoryRequirement - The category of charge for which we want to find charge patterns (null for no restriction)
        Returns:
        All of the charge patterns that may belong to a t-account owner of the given type with the given category restriction

      • getChargePatterns

        public static java.util.List<ChargePattern> getChargePatterns(IType ownerType,
                                              boolean mustBeFee,
                                              boolean mustBeExternal,
                                              boolean mustBeRecapture,
                                              ChargeCategory categoryRequirement)
        Parameters:
        ownerType - Specifies the t-account owner type for which we want to find charge patterns
        mustBeFee - if true, the returned charge patterns will be filtered for ones that are of type fee
        mustBeExternal - if true, the returned charge patterns will be filtered for ones that are of type external
        mustBeRecapture - if true, the returned charge patterns will be filtered for ones that are of type recapture
        categoryRequirement - if not null, the returned charge patterns will be of this category only (includes fees)
        Returns:
        All the charge patterns that match all the given filtration requirements provided in the parameters

      • getChargePattern

        public static ChargePattern getChargePattern(java.lang.String chargePatternName)
        Parameters:
        chargePatternName - The unique charge name for the pattern we are looking for
        Returns:
        The charge pattern where the given chargePatternName is the charge name

      • getChargePatterns

        public static java.util.List<ChargePattern> getChargePatterns(TAccountOwner owner,
                                              boolean mustBeFee,
                                              boolean mustBeExternal,
                                              boolean mustBeRecapture,
                                              ChargeCategory categoryRequirement)
        Parameters:
        owner - The charge patterns that are returned will be filtered to charge patterns which could be owned by the given t-account owner
        mustBeFee - if true, the returned charge patterns will be filtered for ones that are of type fee
        mustBeExternal - if true, the returned charge patterns will be filtered for ones that are of type external
        mustBeRecapture - if true, the returned charge patterns will be filtered for ones that are of type recapture
        categoryRequirement - if not null, the returned charge patterns will be of this category only (includes fees)
        Returns:
        All the charge patterns that match all the given filtration requirements provided in the parameters

      • getReversableChargePatterns

        public static java.util.List<ChargePattern> getReversableChargePatterns()

      • getAvailableInvoiceTreatments

        public static java.util.List<InvoiceTreatment> getAvailableInvoiceTreatments(ChargePattern chargePattern)
        Parameters:
        chargePattern - The charge pattern to look for invoice treatments for.
        Returns:
        The InvoiceTreatment's that are allowed on the given chargePattern
